alert.note: Alert for Hillsborough (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 15 at 10:58AM EST until December 17 at 10:30AM EST by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Tampa Bay Ruskin FL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Florida... Alafia River At Riverview near US 301 affecting Hillsborough County. .Heavy rainfall expected over the next few days will cause the Alafia River to rise into Minor Flood stage over the weekend. For the Alafia...including Lithia , Riverview near US 301...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT TO LATE SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. This approaches the flood of record. * WHERE...Alafia River at Riverview near US 301. * WHEN...From late Saturday night to late Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 4.2 feet, Water begins to impact homes on Pine Avenue and Park Drive. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM EST Friday the stage was -1.0 feet. - Bankfull stage is 4.2 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate around flood stage with a maximum value of 4.4 feet early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 4.2 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 4.4 feet on 12/26/2004. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (11 am EST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Tue Alafia River Riverview near US 4.2 -1.0 Fri 10 am -2.0 0.0 -0.9 -0.9 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening by 1100 PM EST.
